name: Lido Eth 2.0 Staking
description: Stakes {{token}} on [Lido.fi](https://stake.lido.fi) to mint stETH which accumulates ETH 2.0 staking rewards. This strategy will buy stETH off the market if it is cheaper than staking.

en.name: Lido Eth 2.0 Staking
en.description: Stakes {{token}} on [Lido.fi](https://stake.lido.fi) to mint stETH which accumulates ETH 2.0 staking rewards. This strategy will buy stETH off the market if it is cheaper than staking.

fr.name: Lido Eth 2.0 Staking
fr.description: Stakes du {{token}} sur [Lido.fi](https://stake.lido.fi) pour minter du stETH qui accumule les récompenses de staking ETH 2.0. Cette stratégie achètera ensuite du stETH sur le marché si cela revient moins chère que de staker.

tr.name: Lido Eth 2.0 Staking
tr.description: ETH 2.0 staking ödüllerini biriktiren stETH'yi basmak için [Lido.fi](https://stake.lido.fi) üzerinde {{token}} stake eder. Stake etmekten daha ucuzsa, bu strateji piyasadan stETH satın alır.

zh.name: Lido Eth 2.0 Staking
zh.description: 将 {{token}} 存入 [Lido.fi](https://stake.lido.fi) 铸造出 stETH 以赚取 Eth 2.0 质押奖励。如果市场价格比做质押更便宜此策略会直接在市场上购买 stETH。

hi.name: Lido Eth 2.0 Staking
hi.description: [Lido.fi](https://stake.lido.fi) पर {{token}} दांव लगाकर stETH को मिंट करें जो ETH 2.0 स्टेकिंग रिवार्ड जमा करता है। यदि यह दांव से सस्ता है तो यह रणनीति बाजार से stETH को खरीद लेगी।
